mapper.sql: id, xd_name, wenti_miaoshu, fankui_mode, shouLiDanWei, sheJiFanWei, askOverTime, cuoShiFangAn, customer_message, shiShiPlan, actualOverTime, wenTiIsOver, wenTiState, yuliu, createTime, createName, updateTime, updateName,wentiType,auditorState,userid
mapper.select:
select
from mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_wenti where wenTiIsOver=0 order by id desc

SELECT wt.id, userid, xd_name, wenti_miaoshu, fankui_mode, shouLiDanWei, sheJiFanWei, askOverTime, cuoShiFangAn, customer_message, shiShiPlan, actualOverTime, wenTiIsOver, wenTiState, wentiType, auditorState, wa.auditor_id FROM mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_wenti wt LEFT JOIN mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_wenti_auditor wa ON wt.id = wa.object_id and objectType = 1 and auditor_id=#{receiverid}
and xd_name like concat('%',#{xdname},'%')
and wenti_miaoshu like concat('%',#{wenTiMiaoShu},'%')
ORDER BY wt.id desc

select wt.id, userid, xd_name, wenti_miaoshu, fankui_mode, shouLiDanWei, sheJiFanWei, askOverTime, cuoShiFangAn, customer_message, shiShiPlan, actualOverTime, wenTiIsOver, wenTiState, wentiType, auditorState, wa.auditor_id from mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_wenti wt, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_wenti_auditor wa where wt.id = wa.object_id AND objectType = 1 and wt.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and wa.auditor_id=#{receiverid} group by wt.id

mapper.update:
update mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_wenti
xd_name = #{xdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wenti_miaoshu = #{wentiMiaoshu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fankui_mode = #{fankuiMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shouLiDanWei = #{shoulidanwei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sheJiFanWei = #{shejifanwei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
askOverTime = #{askovertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cuoShiFangAn = #{cuoshifangan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_message = #{customerMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shiShiPlan = #{shishiplan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actualOverTime = #{actualovertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
wenTiIsOver = #{wentiisover,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wenTiState = #{wentistate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
yuliu = #{yuliu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

wentiType = #{wentiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auditorState = #{auditorState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_wenti set xd_name = #{xdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wenti_miaoshu = #{wentiMiaoshu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fankui_mode = #{fankuiMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shouLiDanWei = #{shoulidanwei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sheJiFanWei = #{shejifanwei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, askOverTime = #{askovertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cuoShiFangAn = #{cuoshifangan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_message = #{customerMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shiShiPlan = #{shishiplan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actualOverTime = #{actualovertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, wenTiIsOver = #{wentiisover,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wenTiState = #{wentistate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yuliu = #{yuliu,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
